Frank Emerson

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Emmons
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Myron L. Grant
  4. Location of Family: David City, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: David City, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: 1902, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1937-11-19
  10. Gender: male
  11. Notes: Listed as "boarder" in 1920 census.
  12. Source: David City Banner Press, 5 February 1981; OTR, 316; 1920 United States Federal Census; "The Orphan Trains Come to Butler County," script for photographic exhibit.
